name: numth3

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe))
-| wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe)
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ dom(card)= 𝕌

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))

-| wceq(cdm(ccrd), universe)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ dom(card))
⊣ (c0 ∈ c1 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ dom(card)= 𝕌

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cdm(ccrd)))

comment: All sets are well-orderable under choice. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Feb-2015.)
